"Soon as You get close I'll lower my shields. How many bots should I 
be expecting?" 

Phobia knew he was a sitting duck (I mean Spider). Landed in the open 
with nothing but forward guns to protect him. Phobia's sensors showed 
all forms of visible life (Human visibility) there was billions of 
life forms showing, mostly insects, and reptiles. If anyone suspected 
who he was or what he was about to do he'd be executed on sight. 

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Kluster/Chordate::
> 
> "I'll be there," Kluster replies to Phobia, getting up to exit the 
ship.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Seeing the bot fly by him, Chordate activates his thrusters. "Hey, 
wait up!" 
> he yells, flying after Riptide.
